name: Boris In The Cave
description:
Boris In The Cave is a walking simulator with slight interactions.

This was a piece of work for for university between game design and 3d animation and animation students (Myself and 1 other game design with 2 3D animation and game students).

The game is free to download and feel free to comment back, it is in a final experimental state.

The download file is a .rar, please extract the files and then click on the .exe to play
